info.name: Firefox - Hide Addon Arrows
info.description: Hides the drop down arrow on all addons (Example: Greasemonkey, BLoody Vikings, Etc)
info.additionalInfo:
Credits go to AnonEmoose on Mozillazine. He posted the code back in 2004!

Link to thread: http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?t=429098
